sentences.english: It focuses on Ethernet services access, aggregation and transmission in metro area.
sentences.chinese: 它着重于以太网服务的接入，汇聚和城域网传输。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the design and implementation of a broadband IP Metropolitan Area Network in a city for a telecommunication provider.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一个电信宽带IP城域网的设计与实现。

sentences.english: The principles for the construction of IP MAN of CTT's Shandong Branch were presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了山东铁通IP城域网组网建设的原则。

sentences.english: Finally, standardization works in MAN are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 最后介绍了城域网的标准化工作情况。

sentences.english: This article elaborated one education city territory net network design and the realization.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了一个教育城域网的网络设计与实现。

sentences.english: Resilient Packet Ring(RPR) is one of the important development orientation of LANs.
sentences.chinese: 弹性分组环是城域网发展的重要方向。

sentences.english: Advanced enterprise applications are driving the demand for metropolitan-area network (MAN) services.
sentences.chinese: 先进的企业应用正在推动城域网业务的发展。

sentences.english: Wireless Metropolitan Area Networking (WMAN) and WiMax technology.
Choosing right networking technology is key to MAN construction.
sentences.chinese: 如何选择组网技术是建设城域网的关键。

sentences.english: This article introduces experience of construction and use of education city area network in Shouguang City Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了山东省寿光市建设和使用教育城域网的经验。

sentences.english: And finally we completed the entire transformation of GuangZhou UNICOM MAN.
sentences.chinese: 最终达到对广州联通整个城域网全面优化改造。
